name: web-core
description: Core Utils for Odoo Web Client

scripts.bundle:core: tsc -m es6 --lib es2017,dom --target esnext --outdir dist src/bundles/core.ts && rollup dist/bundles/core.js --file dist/bundle-core.js --format iife
scripts.demo: cp -r demo/ dist/demo && tsc -m amd --lib es2017,dom --target esnext --outfile dist/demo/main.js demo/src/main.ts
